${ModID}:ShootingStar.NAME: Shooting Star
${ModID}:ShootingStar.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} next turn.

${ModID}:MoonlitRitual.NAME: Moonlit Ritual
${ModID}:MoonlitRitual.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bless a random card in your draw pile: "Gain [E] and move this ${ModID}:Blessing to a random card in your draw pile." NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MoonlitRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ${ModID}:Bless a random card in your draw pile: "Gain [E] and move this ${ModID}:Blessing to a random card in your draw pile." NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and move this #yBlessing to a random card in your draw pile.

${ModID}:Relapse.NAME: Relapse
${ModID}:Relapse.DESCRIPTION: Play and trigger the ${ModID}:Forget effects of up to !M! random Ethereal cards from your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RisingStorm.NAME: Rising Storm
${ModID}:RisingStorm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ${ModID}:Blessed card, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Imprinting.NAME: Imprinting
${ModID}:Imprinting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Blessings aren't removed from this card.

${ModID}:Emptiness.NAME: Emptiness
${ModID}:Emptiness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:HollowGrasp.NAME: Hollow Grasp
${ModID}:HollowGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Salvation.NAME: Salvation
${ModID}:Salvation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
${ModID}:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ToothAndNail.NAME: Tooth And Nail
${ModID}:ToothAndNail.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RushPast.NAME: Rush Past
${ModID}:RushPast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:TimeStop.NAME: Time Stop
${ModID}:TimeStop.DESCRIPTION: You cannot take damage or lose HP this turn.

${ModID}:OppressiveAura.NAME: Oppressive Aura
${ModID}:OppressiveAura.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next !M! turns, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:NightTerrors.NAME: Night Terrors
${ModID}:NightTerrors.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Disarray.NAME: Disarray
${ModID}:Disarray.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile. NL ${ModID}:Warp !${ModID}:m2! turn{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:HollowCognition.NAME: Hollow Cognition
${ModID}:HollowCognition.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:FleetingFortitude.NAME: Fleeting Fortitude
${ModID}:FleetingFortitude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.NAME: Before Your Eyes
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted due to being Ethereal, add a random card to your hand.

${ModID}:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
${ModID}:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 2 additional damage for each turn this combat.

${ModID}:FalteringGuard.NAME: Faltering Guard
${ModID}:FalteringGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This becomes Ethereal.

${ModID}:Dread.NAME: Dread
${ModID}:Dread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if there is an Ethereal card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have an Ethereal card in my hand.
I ~will~ ~not~ have an Ethereal card in my hand?
I... ~didn't?~ have an Ethereal card in my hand.

${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.NAME: Obscuring Haze
${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If you have an Ethereal card in your hand, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Reverie.NAME: Reverie
${ModID}:Reverie.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card, then shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Reverie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw a card, then shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:DeadFlesh.NAME: Dead Flesh
${ModID}:DeadFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Wither to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Affliction.NAME: Affliction
${ModID}:Affliction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${ModID}:Wither equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Distort.NAME: Distort
${ModID}:Distort.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
${ModID}:BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL At the start of your next turn, lose {!${ModID}:m2!|repeat=[E] }. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BorrowedTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL At the start of your next turn, lose {!${ModID}:m2!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Accumulate.NAME: Accumulate
${ModID}:Accumulate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Apathy.NAME: Apathy
${ModID}:Apathy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.
